# Project Initialization Skill

Reference to skill definition at `.ai-agents/skills/project-initialization.md`

## Quick Reference

**Trigger**: Conductor's `#init` command

**Capabilities**:
1. Collect user-provided project context
2. Analyze project structure and tech stack
3. Interactive deep-dive analysis
4. Save results to knowledge base

See full documentation in `.ai-agents/skills/project-initialization.md`.
